short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will ensure you will not copy data that you are not authorized to duplicate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our student website has a check that only allow you to access the content if you have this extension installed.

This extension will prevent your browser from copying some protected data (disabling the clipboard), it ensure you will not copy data that you are not authorized to duplicate.
